extensionAttribute.displayName: OS - Non Admins Can Install Printers
extensionAttribute.description: This extension attribute will verify that non-admin users can add printers.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh everyoneGroup=`/usr/bin/dscl . read /Groups/everyone GeneratedUID | sed 's/GeneratedUID: //g'` result=`/usr/bin/dscl . read /Groups/lpadmin | grep $everyoneGroup` if [ "$result" == "" ]; then echo "<result>Fail (Admin authentication required.)</result>" else echo "<result>Pass (Users can add printers)</result>" fi
